name: Dino Fishing Simulator 3D
description:
Do you like to go fishing? Then this fantastic prehistoric fishing game is made exactly for you! Catch ancient fish and mighty dinosaurs with different tools and have fun playing Dino Fishing Simulator 3D!
Explore Pacific Ocean, where the portal to the prehistoric times had opened a couple of months ago! Thousands of fishers from abroad came here to catch interesting yield! Travel back in time, join this challenging tournament, use wide range of different tools and become the best fisherman ever!
This prehistoric sports fishing turned to a real fever! And this is not surprising, ‘cause here you can catch really special haul! Dallasaurus, Goronyosaurus, Mosasaurus, Plotosaurus, Hainosaurus would become your predator yield! You can also catch a shark like Cretolamna or even Carcharodon Megalodon, but is it as interesting as dino? The choice is up to you!
Earn points and buy your special prehistoric fisherman’s tackle like harpoon gun, spear, new powerful spinning and other! Your mission is to level up your fishing skills (like tying knots, for example) and catch as much dinos as possible with Dino Fishing Simulator 3D!
Hurry up, otherwise every reptile will be caught be the other people!
Dino Fishing Simulator 3D features:
• Interesting prehistoric fishing simulator
• Different fisherman tackles
• Wide range of dinosaurs and ancient sharks to catch
• Special shop to buy new equipment or upgrade it
• Realistic 3D graphics
Get rid of the routine fishing! Set off for a place, where time has collapsed, and catch the best yield ever! Join Dino Fishing Simulator 3D game and have fun!
